name: Final Fantasy Type-0 HD Collector's Edition
summary:
The Collector’s Edition of Final Fantasy TYPE-0 HD comes in a collector’s box and includes: 
 
- Golden SteelBook case featuring illustrations by artist Yoshitaka Amano 
- A Soundtrack CD with music selected by the game’s composer, Takeharu Ishimoto 
- A 200 page Finaly Fantasy TYPE-0 manga 
- An 80 PAGE ART BOOK 
- Five life-size replicas of the cards held by Class Zero’s Ace. 
- Final Fantasy XV Episode Duscae demo.
